properties.description: Excelから読み込んでSex='male'だけフィルタしてSinkに書き込む

transformations.name: mapdrifted
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PassengerId as double,
		Survived as double,
		Pclass as double,
		Name as string,
		Sex as string,
		Age as double,
		SibSp as double,
		Parch as double,
		Ticket as string,
		Fare as double,
		Cabin as string,
		Embarked as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	format: 'excel',
	fileSystem: 'blob',
	sheetName: 'titanic',
	firstRowAsHeader: true,
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'double',
	wildcardPaths:['input/excel/*.xlsx']) ~> source1
mapdrifted filter(Sex == 'male') ~> filtermale
source1 derive(PassengerId = toString(byName('PassengerId')),
		Survived = toString(byName('Survived')),
		Pclass = toString(byName('Pclass')),
		Name = toString(byName('Name')),
		Sex = toString(byName('Sex')),
		Age = toString(byName('Age')),
		SibSp = toString(byName('SibSp')),
		Parch = toString(byName('Parch')),
		Ticket = toString(byName('Ticket')),
		Fare = toString(byName('Fare')),
		Cabin = toString(byName('Cabin')),
		Embarked = toString(byName('Embarked'))) ~> mapdrifted
filtermale sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'blob',
	folderPath: 'output',
	truncate: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
